title: Crashing after champ select
body: I recently put in a new graphics card (gtx 960) and every time champ select ends my game crashes before load screen plz help.

replies.body: I deleted overwolf and the same thing keeps happening is there anything else that you recommend?

Give your computer a restart after the uninstall, and try again- in a custom game to prevent penalties.  Otherwise, there may be driver issues or bad game files causing this.  I suggest going through each step in our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide until this gets fixed up.  Hope that helps!
thank you will try and let you know.

I've seen a few reports on this, and it seems that there are some third party programs that's causing the client to crash.  If you are using any that interact with league like Play.tv or Overwolf, please disable all of them.  Let me know the results!
